snippet: Even as their campaign of violence continued, the insurgents took time to praise polio inoculation.
abstract: Taliban, even as their campaign of violence continues, attempts to improve their image by releasing four of eight Turkish citizens captured in Logar Province and promising to release other four soon; group's spokesman also praises polio vaccinations, urging Taliban commanders to support efforts of international organizations working to eradicate the disease.
lead_paragraph: Even as their campaign of violence continued, the insurgents took time to praise polio inoculation.

headline.seo: Taliban Keep Up Campaign to Win Public Support
headline.main: In Afghanistan, Taliban Release 4 of 8 Turks in an Image Offensive
